00196 #define VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_MAKE(__class) \
00197     static __class* make() { \
00198         __class *obj = new __class(); \
00199         if (obj) { \
00200           (void) obj->acquire(); \
00201         } else { \
00202           throw std::bad_alloc(); \
00203         } \
00204         return obj; \
00205     } \
00206  private: \
00207     __class &operator=(const __class &); \
00208     __class(const __class &); \
00209     static void * operator new (size_t aSize) { return ::operator new(aSize); }
00210 
00211 #define VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT(__class) \
00212     public: \
00213         VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_MAKE(__class) \
00214     private:
00215 
00216 #define VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT_PRIVATE_MAKE(__className) \
00217     private: \
00218         VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_MAKE(__className) \
00219     private:
00220 
00221 }}}
00222 
00223 #define VS_REF_ACQUIRE(__object) \
00224   do { \
00225     if (__object) { \
00226       (__object)->acquire(); \
00227     } \
00228   } while (0)
00229 
00230 #define VS_REF_RELEASE(__object) \
00231   do { \
00232     if (__object) { \
00233       (__object)->release(); \
00234     } \
00235     (__object) = 0; \
00236   } while (0)
00237 
00238 #endif /*REFCOUNTED_H_*/
